mapper.insert: insert into t_member_join_hospital (sid, member_id, hospital_id, join_type, foreign_id, operator_type, operator_id, in_date, ext_data,insert_dt,update_dt) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{joinType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{foreignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operatorType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{extData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{insertDt},#{updateDt})
mapper.select: select count(mjh.sid) allMember, sum(if(mci.checkin_status = 1, 1, 0)) inHosMember, sum(if(mjh.attention = 1, 1, 0)) attentionMember, sum(if(tm.is_diabetes = 1, 1, 0)) diabetesMember, sum(if(tm.essential_hyp = 1, 1, 0)) hypMember from t_member_join_hospital mjh join t_member tm on mjh.member_id = tm.member_id left join (select member_id,checkin_status,hospital_id from t_member_checkin_info where is_valid = 1) mci on mjh.member_id = mci.member_id where mjh.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} and mjh.valid = 1
select member_id from t_member_join_hospital where valid = 1 group by member_id
select sid, member_id, hospital_id, join_type, foreign_id, operator_type, operator_id, in_date, ext_data, insert_dt, update_dt, valid from t_member_join_hospital where sid = #{sid} limit 1

select mjh.sid, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.mobile_phone, m.sex, m.birthday,mjh.valid,m.pic_url from t_member_join_hospital mjh join t_member m on m.member_id = mjh.member_id where 1=1
and mjh.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
and DATE_FORMAT(mjh.insert_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= #{refreshTime} and mjh.valid = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(mjh.update_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= #{outRefreshTime} and mjh.valid = 0
order by mjh.insert_dt desc

select m.member_id, m.member_name, m.mobile_phone, m.sex, m.birthday, DATE_FORMAT(fm.fill_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') lastFollowDt,fm.doctor_id,fm.doctor_name, case when fm.type = 7 then '糖尿病随访' when fm.type = 11 then '高血压随访' else '其他随访' end followType, case when m.is_diabetes = 1 and m.essential_hyp = 1 then '高血压-糖尿病' when m.is_diabetes = 1 then '糖尿病' when m.essential_hyp = 1 then '高血压' else '无' end diabetesType from t_member_join_hospital mjh join t_member m on m.member_id = mjh.member_id left join (select * from (select type,fill_dt,member_id,doctor_name,doctor_id from t_follow_main where type in (7,11) and is_valid = 1 and status = 1 having 1 order by fill_dt desc) a group by a.member_id) fm on fm.member_id = mjh.member_id where mjh.valid = 1
and mjh.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
AND (instr( m.member_name ,#{keyword}) > 0 or instr( m.mobile_phone ,#{mobilePhone}) > 0)
order by fm.fill_dt desc,mjh.insert_dt desc
